ma.cpp

1 #include "lib/ma.h"
2 
3 ma::ma ()
4 {
5  // init map publisher
6  int queue_size;
7  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/queue_size", queue_size, 1);
8  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/publish_map", publish_map, false);
9  map_publisher = nh.advertise<nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid>("area/map", queue_size, true);
10 
11  // subscribe to map
12  map_subscriber = nh.subscribe("map", queue_size, &ma::map_callback, this);
13 
14  // wait a bit to see if there is a map provided by another node
15  double loop_rate;
16  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/loop_rate", loop_rate, 1.0);
17  Rate rate(loop_rate);
18  double wait_for_map;
19  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/wait_for_map", wait_for_map, 2.0);
20  Time start = Time::now();
21  while (ok() && Time::now() < start + Duration(wait_for_map)) {
22  spinOnce();
23  rate.sleep();
24  }
25 
26  // there is a map, extract it's coordinates
27  if (gridmaps.count(0) > 0)
28  map_to_coords();
29 
30  // if there is no map, import coordinates
31  else {
32  read_coords();
33 
34  // convert global coordinates
35  if (global) {
36  global_to_local ();
37  }
38 
39  set_origin();
40  }
41 
42  // publish grid map
43  if (publish_map)
44  map_publisher.publish(get_gridmap());
45  else
46  ROS_INFO("Not publishing map");
47 }
48 
49 void ma::map_to_coords ()
50 {
51  // extract coordinates from (un-rotated) map
52  pair<double,double> c;
53 
54  // top right
55  c.first += gridmaps[0][resolution].info.height * resolution;
56  coords[0].insert(c);
57 
58  // top left
59  c.first = gridmaps[0][resolution].info.origin.position.x;
60  coords[0].insert(c);
61 
62  // bottom left
63  c.first = gridmaps[0][resolution].info.origin.position.x;
64  c.second = gridmaps[0][resolution].info.origin.position.y;
65  coords[0].insert(c);
66 
67  // bottom right
68  c.first += gridmaps[0][resolution].info.width * resolution;
69  coords[0].insert(c);
70 }
71 
72 void ma::read_coords ()
73 {
74  // read area coordinates
75  vector<double> area_x;
76  vector<double> area_y;
77  nh.getParam(this_node::getName() + "/area_x", area_x);
78  nh.getParam(this_node::getName() + "/area_y", area_y);
79  if (gridmaps.count(0) == 0 && gridmaps[0].count(resolution) == 0 && (area_x.size() != area_y.size() || area_x.size() < 3)) {
80  ROS_FATAL("AREA_PROV - Invalid area, it must contain at least three coordinates! Exiting...");
81  shutdown();
82  }
83 
84  // store area coordinates in right format
85  for (int i = 0; i < area_x.size(); ++i) {
86  coords[0].emplace(area_x[i], area_y[i]);
87  }
88 
89  sort_coords();
90 }
91 
92 void ma::map_callback (const nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid::ConstPtr& msg)
93 {
94  // store resolution of given map
95  resolution = msg->info.resolution;
96 
97  // store un-rotated map
98  gridmaps[0][resolution] = *msg;
99 
100  // use only initial map
101  map_subscriber.shutdown();
102 }
